creditline: Gift of Peter Pflaum and Stephen R. Pflaum
description: recto: line drawing of seated figure with short curlly hair; legs crossed; ring on PL hand; verso: line drawing of a seated figure; simplified
inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

recto, ULQ in pencil: [MECHANIN]
markings: verso, lower left corner, impressed in paper: [BRISTOL (on an oval with a buckle)/ AL]
title: Portrait of Oscar Miestchanoff, I. (recto and verso)
